units.name: Strike Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

datasheet.name: Sanctifying Ritual (Psychic)
datasheet.description: If you control an objective marker at the end of your Command phase and this unit is within range of that objective marker, that objective marker remains under you control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Brotherhood Terminator Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

datasheet.name: Hammerhand (Psychic)
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a Charge move, until the end of the turn, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Narthecium
datasheet.description: In your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTERS) to the bearer’s unit.|Wargear||

wargear.name: Ancient’s Banner
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

units.name: Purifier Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Purifying Flame; storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

datasheet.name: Sanctity of Purpose
datasheet.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if this unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if this unit is Below Half-strength.|Datasheet||

units.name: Paladin Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

datasheet.name: Inner Fortitude (Psychic)
datasheet.description: Each time an attack targets this unit, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

wargear.name: Ancient’s Banner
wargear.description: Add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in the bearer’s unit.

units.name: Interceptor Squad
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: storm bolter; Nemesis force weapon.

datasheet.name: Personal Teleporters
datasheet.description:
In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6" as if it were your Movement phase. If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.|Datasheet||
000000388|1|000008343||||Core||
000000388|2|000008453||||Faction||
000000388|3|||Astral Aim (Psychic)|In your Shooting phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [INDIRECT FIRE] ability, provided the target of that weapon is visible to one or more other friendly GREY KNIGHTS PSYKER units.|Datasheet||
000000389|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000000389|2|000008343||||Core||
000000389|3|000008453||||Faction||
000000389|4|||Empyric Reprisal (Psychic)|This model is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.|Datasheet||
000000390|1|000008339||||Core|1|
000000390|2|||Wisdom of the Ancients (Aura)|While a friendly GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grey Knights Land Raider

datasheet.name: Assault Ramp
datasheet.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grey Knights Land Raider Crusader
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 hurricane bolters; twin assault cannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Assault Ramp
datasheet.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grey Knights Land Raider Redeemer
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 flamestorm cannons; twin assault cannon; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Assault Ramp
datasheet.description: Each time a unit disembarks from this model after it has made a Normal move, that unit is still eligible to declare a charge this turn.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grey Knights Razorback
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Fire Support
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit it scored one or more hits against this phase. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this Transport this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grey Knights Rhino
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: storm bolter; armoured tracks.

datasheet.name: Self Repair
datasheet.description: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.|Datasheet||

units.name: Servitors
units.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Servitor’s servo-arm.

datasheet.name: Mindlock
datasheet.description: While a BROTHERHOOD TECHMARINE model is leading this unit, improve the Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill characteristics of ranged and melee weapons equipped by SERVITOR models in this unit by 1.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Retinue
datasheet.description: While a BROTHERHOOD TECHMARINE model is leading this unit, models in this unit have the Deep Strike and Teleport Assault abilities.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: SERVITOR RETINUE
datasheet.description: At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, this unit can join one other unit from your army that is being led by a BROTHERHOOD TECHMARINE (a unit cannot have more than one SERVITORS unit joined to it). If it does, until the end of the battle, every model in this unit counts as being part of that Bodyguard unit, and that Bodyguard unit’s Starting Strength is increased accordingly.|Special (правая колонка)||

units.name: Grey Knights Stormraven Gunship
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 stormstrike missile launchers; twin assault cannon; typhoon missile launcher; armoured hull.

datasheet.name: Armoured Resilience
datasheet.description: Each time an attack is allocated to this model, subtract 1 from the Damage characteristic of that attack.

units.name: Brotherhood Techmarine
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: boltgun; flamer; plasma cutter; Omnissian power axe; servo-arms.

datasheet.name: Awaken the Machine Spirit
datasheet.description:
In your Command phase, you can select one friendly GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE model within 6" of this model. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time that VEHICLE model makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||
000000399|5|||Omnissiah’s Blessing|In your Command phase, you can select one friendly GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE model within 3" of this model. That VEHICLE model regains up to D3 lost wounds. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Techmarine
datasheet.description:
While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly GREY KNIGHTS VEHICLE units, unless it is leading a unit, this model has the Lone Operative ability.|Datasheet||
000000400|1|000008339||||Core|1|
000000400|2|||Wisdom of the Ancients (Aura)|While a friendly GREY KNIGHTS INFANTRY unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.|Datasheet||

units.name: Grey Knights Venerable Dreadnought
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: assault cannon; storm bolter; Dreadnought combat weapon.

units.name: Land Raider Banisher
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 heavy incinerators; twin psycannon; armoured tracks.

units.name: Grey Knights Thunderhawk Gunship
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: 2 lascannons; Thunderhawk heavy cannon; 4 twin heavy bolters; armoured hull; Thunderhawk cluster bombs.

units.name: Grand Master In Nemesis Dreadknight
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: dreadfists.

datasheet.name: Heroism’s Favour
datasheet.description: Each time you target this model with a Stratagem, it only costs 1CP to use, even if the CP cost is higher.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Surge of Wrath (Psychic)
datasheet.description: Once per battle round, in the Fight phase, one model from your army with this ability can use it before resolving its attacks. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time that model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll, you can re-roll the Wound roll and you can re-roll the Damage roll.|Datasheet||

units.name: Brotherhood Librarian
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: Purge Soul; Nemesis force weapon.

datasheet.name: Sanctic Hood
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Vortex of Doom (Psychic)
datasheet.description: In your Shooting phase, you can select one enemy unit within 18" of and visible to this PSYKER(excluding units with the Lone Operative ability that are not part of an Attached unit and are not within 12" of this PSYKER). If you do, roll one D6: on a 1, this PSYKER’s unit suffers D6 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, that enemy unit suffers 2D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that enemy unit suffers 2D6 mortal wounds.|Datasheet||

units.name: Brotherhood Chaplain
units.loadout: This model is equipped with: storm bolter; crozius arcanum.

datasheet.name: Words of Power (Psychic)
datasheet.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.|Datasheet||

datasheet.name: Dread Bearing (Aura)
datasheet.description:
While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit takes a Battle-shock or Leadership test, subtract 1 from that test.|Datasheet||
000001363|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001363|2|000008342||||Core||
000001363|3|||Interceptor|Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that can Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||
000001364|1|000008339||||Core|D3|
000001364|2|000008342||||Core||
000001364|3|||Strafing Run|Each time this model makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that cannot Fly, add 1 to the Hit roll.|Datasheet||
000001367|1|000008346||||Core||
000001367|2|000008396||||Faction||
000001367|3|||Putrefying Stink|While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.|Datasheet||
000001368|1|000008339||||Core|1|
000001368|2|000008346||||Core||
000001368|3|000008396||||Faction||
000001368|4|||Foul Infusion|While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. In addition, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, a Critical Hit is scored on an unmodified Hit roll of 5+, instead of only a 6.|Datasheet||
000001368|5|||Explosive Maladies|Once per battle round, you can target one unit from your army with this ability with the Grenade Stratagem for 0CP.|Datasheet||
000001369|1|000008346||||Core||
000001369|2|000008396||||Faction||
000001369|3|||Tainted Narthecium|While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return 1 destroyed Bodyguard model to that unit.|Datasheet||
000001369|4|||Diseased Healing|At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one friendly DEATH GUARD INFANTRY CHARACTER model within 3" of this model. That model regains up to 3 lost wounds. Each model can only be selected for this ability once per turn.|Datasheet||
